record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - October 30, 2007)

[Page: H12208]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, today I was detained and unable to vote on the final passage of the Small Business Contracting Program Improvements Act.
Had I been present, I would have voted "yes" on H.R. 3867, the Small Business Contracting Program Improvements Act, House rollcall vote 1017.
